website_summaries.verdict: A simple and comfortable strap that works well and fits most standard yoga mats.
pros: Can be used on thick mats
Easy to slip on and pull to tighten
Strap is long enough to sling over your shoulder
cons: Mat can sometimes get loose and slip out

customer_reviews.title: I love this strap
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap. It is very sturdy and heavy duty. The holes that your mat goes into is adjustable so it is very easy to remove/replace and would fit mats of all sizes whether they be thicker or thinner. You could also fit two mats in there if you wanted to because there would still be enough room to carry it around on your shoulder. I use my mat at a college yoga class, so I carry my mat around all day and this strap is very comfortable to wear. It is not stretchy at all and pretty thick. It's an awesome deal for the cheap price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great for any mat
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a 1" thick mat for my return to teacing inside at the Y. Mats are no longer being provided and I like some cushioning under my knees. The mat didn't come with a strap, so I looked around and bought this one, because it's adjustable. It fits fine, although it won't be a shoulder strap, but more of a handle, due to the thickness of the mat. I needed something to keep the mat from unrolling during transport and to aid in the ease of carrying it from place to place. I think this strap will work well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a mat carrier and Yoga strap.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. I have a thick mat and my wife has a thin one. Works for either quite nicely. No metal so it can go out onto the gym floor with me to serve as my Yoga strap. I'm 5'8" and it reaches just fine. If you're very tall it might not work as a strap for you. Sturdy construction, looks like it will last. Prime shipping so got here in two days. What's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Busch

customer_reviews.title: Almost but not quite
customer_reviews.text: This strap seemed like a solution to replace my current mat strap that broke apart at the seams. It was elastic and super stretchy but not strong enough. The FitLifestyleCo strap was strong but not stretchy so no matter how you try to twist it to make it smaller/tighter, it doesn’t hold on as well and loosens my mat. It’s not worth sending back but I will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybee

customer_reviews.title: awesome yoga mat strap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my mom who has been walking to and from the gym, just holding her rolled-up yoga mat. This was a light, easy-to-use, awesome yoga mat strap. I eventually had to purchase another for myself because I was so jealous of how nice HER new strap was. I love how dynamic the material is: it is stretchy enough to hang onto my mat but doesn't compress it and leave marks like other straps I've used. I also liked that it was long enough for me to strap over my body on my walks to and from the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Bork

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a couple of different velcro type straps which were okay, but you had to make sure your mat was wound tight. This one works no matter what size. You just slip it on and and pull to tighten. Don't know why it took a couple of tryouts before purchasing this one!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: The perfection of simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I have never experienced a more easy to use, functional yoga mat strap up until now. I'm relatively new to my Bikram classes and the last thing I feel like doing after getting wiped out by my class is fumbling around with my yoga mat strap. I also love how long the shoulder strap is. I can easily sling it over my head as to not worry about it slipping off my shoulder on the way to my car. Sometimes simplicity is best.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what Ineed!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this now that we have to bring our own mats to the gym .. mymat did not come with a strap- this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I needed. I was looking for something to help me make more floor space in my office/exercise room. With the help of a few 3M wall hooks and this product here, I was able to get my yoga mats, foam roller, and back mat off the floor and onto my wall with very little effort. Now I have more floor space in my room to workout. The end-loops open wide to fit any size object (within reason) to be able to carry around or to hang up. The material that it is made from is also pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga strap, easy to use and good quality. I would recommend this and buy again. It even fits 2 of my thick yoga mats together (even though it is bulky because of the mats not the strap). Simple design and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Kestner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The yoga matt carrying sling is well made and is flexible enough to accommodate a variety of mat sizes. Perfect for when you want a lightweight alternative for bringing your mat to your workout or yoga session.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product. It is wonderful! I was afraid it was going to slip with my yoga mat, but it does not budge at all! The quality is amazing, such thick fabric that feels incredibly durable. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple quality strap at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I've been practicing yoga for over 12 years now and have used many mat straps, bags, you name it. Most mat straps you order online is flimsy and overtime, the material gets stretched out, but not this. This strap is super durable. I use this strap to carry my 10lb Manduka Pro Mat and it holds up really well.
customer_reviews.author: julie chang

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of holding my yogaMatt while bike riding to class, so glad I bought this strap so I can sling it over my back. The strap works very well and grips on to yoga mat as expected. Very pleased. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Holds TWO Yoga Mats!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! It holds TWO yoga mats (one regular and one super thick mats). The straps are super stout and well stitched; seems like it would last a long time. LuLu Lemon didn't have anything like it and the price is under $10.00. Very happy indeed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little strap
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly what I need it to do and seems like it will hold up for years to come. Great product, great price. I would recommend this product without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga carrying strap
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to carry my yoga mat to class, something simple and easy to use, and this strap is perfect. Its easy to put on and take off of the mat. It stays on and doesn't slide off while I'm carrying it. It seems very durable and well made and should last a long time. I love that it's cotton too. It would accommodate any size mat, thin or thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something simple and comfortable. This fit the bill perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new strap after the cheapo one that came with my mat broke. I wanted something simple and comfortable. This fit the bill perfectly. The strap is wider than most straps and the Timbuc2 case that I carry my phone in attaches perfectly. The loops make it supper simple to get your mat in and out and it will self adjust to fit any mat. Great buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: VickDScott

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite item!
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple, reliable, & convenient this carrying sling is. I ride my bike to yoga classes sometimes and can totally trust that my mat won't move/slip off - it's a heavier mat at that! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: The strap that game with my yoga mat was lost. I carried it w/o a strap for a while but became tired of this. I purchsed item and was pleasantly surprised that this was adjustable and fits my thin and thick max
customer_reviews.author: T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to carry yoga mats
customer_reviews.text: Good so far, I've only hooked it onto my mats & it appears that it will work out great. I had straps on the side of my yoga bag & the mats really weighed it down. Having the strong strap makes them easier to carry in distributing the weight much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best things in life are simple in concept and design, sturdy, and inexpensive. This device fits that description. I personally didn’t need it in fancy colors, and the black strap is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Honest customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sling for asipring Yogis!
customer_reviews.text: The material was a lot thicker than I expected, but it is perfect! My mat came with a strap but it was stretchy, so it stretched out and wouldn't carry my my mat anymore. Got this, and its awesome! I have an extra thick yoga mat and it has no issues carrying it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, simple, and efficient. My yoga mat is large, heavy, and cumbersome. This made it workable.
customer_reviews.author: acpd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Strao
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy strap. Fits my yoga mat nicely with room to spare for my yoga towel and sweat towel.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: For the price, very much worth it!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it very much does what it needs to do - contain your yoga mat and make it easy to transport! It obviously isn't nearly as fancy as a $20 carrying strap but it does its job. It does not lay super tight on the yoga mat but it is easy to use and so far easy to transport. I am kind of short so I will say the strap is a bit long; I am 5' and when I carry it lands below my hip.
customer_reviews.author: Gisel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very useful strap!
customer_reviews.text: I have thus far purchased a total of 5 of these straps. Such a simple and inexpensive item has made several of my friends so happy. It keeps your mat tidy in the car and is so easy to carry into the studio or gym while often carrying other bags too. Not sure why I didn't get one sooner. It is strong and wide enough that it doesn't dig into your shoulders. I totally recommend this carrying sling for your yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The material is so soft but feels very durable
customer_reviews.text: I've always used a bag or case for my yoga mat but I became worried about germs so I decided to use a strap instead. I have never used one before and I'm so glad I came across this one! It is very soft at the touch but the strap itself feels very strong and durable. My yoga mat is made out of recycled scuba suits so its very heavy and this strap holds it perfectly. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anaiah

customer_reviews.title: Genius in simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strap for my husband who does not like a lot of frill. He does yoga at his martial arts gym, so he already has a gym bag with his equipment in it, so he just needed a way to carry his yoga mat along with his other things. He really likes it. No buckles or other moving parts to break. This strap should last him from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and durable
customer_reviews.text: You can fit different sized mats with ease. Firmly grips, easy to remove. You can and you mat from this strap over a door knob for easy grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat Strap
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat strap. It’s very sturdy & easy to use. I’m glad I found you. I plan on buying another for my second mat.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as reviews claimed
customer_reviews.text: This is nowhere near as great as I'd expected given the popularity of the item. It doesn't secure tightly, which was the whole reason I bought it. I've seen other straps at my studio that look much better. I also realized I should have gotten a bag to protect from rain and snow (I'm in Boston).
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome strap!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like velcro closures, so I'm very glad this stays closed by the weight of your mat alone. Also, I use 2 mats because of bad knees, and since the sides can open until they touch, even huge mats or 2 mats put together fit. It may not leave much of a strap to put over your shoulder, but it'll fit.
customer_reviews.author: Adar

customer_reviews.title: Good strap for the price. we will see about its durability
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this was going to look like a cheap nylon utlity strap but am glad I was wrong, it does the job and is a softer woven cotton. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Schneid

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution
customer_reviews.text: Chose this over the Manduka strap because of the price. It’s very sturdy and easy to use. I have 0 qualms
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I could not find something to help me carry my big thick yoga mat. This did the trick because it's completely adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Rip it, RIP it real good
customer_reviews.text: Material began to rip before my 30 day return period. Thank goodness this happened before so I was able to return. I wont be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo S

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect, easy to put on my yoga mat and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My yoga mat doesn't slip or slide out of this when I'm carrying it. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this strap for my mat and work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: diedril

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory
customer_reviews.text: This strap is just what I hoped it would be - sturdy, simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Worth

customer_reviews.title: No sliding
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap. Easy on and off and does not slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and makes carrying the yoga mat to class easy. The strap loops upon itself and is fully ...
customer_reviews.text: The strap is simple, lightweight and makes carrying the yoga mat to class easy. The strap loops upon itself and is fully adjustable to fit the mat whether it is folded compressed or fluffy. Since I walk to class and have arthritis, simple and lightweight are perfect for me. The strap sits comfortably on my shoulder without any additional padding.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is functional. It keeps my yoga mat rolled ...
customer_reviews.text: It is functional. It keeps my yoga mat rolled and makes it easier to carry my mat. I previously had a bag that shrunk after I threw it in the wash so I needed something new to carry my mat. I miss the bag and being able to stash my keys and wallet in it, but didn't want to spend quite so much this time. This works and is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erin3982

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Manduka EKO mat and I wasn't about to spring a lot of additional money for a "brand name" strap just to carry the mat from my car to the yoga studio. This carrying sling works perfectly and didn't break what was left in my piggy bank.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Lew

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like my yoga strap a lot. It will adjust to fit any thickness of mat. The price was reasonable. I don't know how well it wears since I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Mohney

customer_reviews.title: Big, thick and strong. Yes, I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Big, thick and strong. Yes, I am talking about my yoga straps. This one will never break. Or I'm quitting yoga all together.
customer_reviews.author: Jung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great yoga strap! I was looking for something inexpensive and simple, and this product met all of my needs. It is easy to put on and seems like really great quality. I am glad I got one of these straps, it makes carrying my mat so much easier. Shipping was easy and I received the item on time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no rubber damaging Velcro
customer_reviews.text: This strap is a nice sturdy cotton material and I like that it cinches to the mat rather than using Velcro which I'm always afraid will damage the rubber. The cinching also makes it one size fits all. Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I needed to haul my yoga mat & blanket to my yoga classes. Simple in design, yet so very efficient. Love it so much that after one use I ordered one for my best friend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Also comfortable on my shoulders and doesn't leave marks which is ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY DURABLE STRAP! Also comfortable on my shoulders and doesn't leave marks which is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Virg0_07

customer_reviews.title: nifty yoga mat carrier
customer_reviews.text: great transaction great product for my 5m yoga mat. and you can use it for stretching.... very happy to have invested in this yoga mat strap
customer_reviews.author: T. Pink

customer_reviews.title: This is a great "useful thingy"
customer_reviews.text: I use this Carrying Strap to roll up my yoga mat as it is very thick and is rather cumbersome. I can sling it over my shoulder and go!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie's grandma

customer_reviews.title: Durable strap!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to use, and a good length. This seems made of good fabric. I like that it's a little longer than others for cross-body transport. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany R.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this needs a review, but this works just like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. It is much easier carrying my mat into the center. I was afraid it would slide open and the mat would fall out but that hasn't happened.
customer_reviews.author: LuvOahu

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wrap on the mat. Holds the mat together. Also doubles as a yoga strap which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: ... bit rather than if it were elastic but seems good for what I need it for (yoga mat) and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cloth wraps so it might slip a bit rather than if it were elastic but seems good for what I need it for (yoga mat) and it was adjustable so you can fit any size although the larger the object the shorter the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: It holds my mat in place regardless of how tight or loose I roll it. Just what I needed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Works great with our yoga mats
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our yoga mats! Straps are durable and we use them with a kids Gaia mat and an adult Lululemon mat. This is exactly what I wanted and am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a simple, inexpensive but durable mat strap, and finally found this one by Fit Lifestyle. It is the best- easy to use, slim, attractive, functional. Thank you! Wish more things in "life" could be so easy and practical, like this item ;-))
customer_reviews.author: ymt

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: I do Bikram yoga and found myself struggling with the straps after class because my mat/hands were sweaty/hot/wet. This strap is so easy to get on and off after class. I would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I didn't get one of these sooner ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I didn't get one of these sooner! This makes coming in and out of yoga so much easier (and you can use it during your practice as a yoga strap!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for keeping and carrying my yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for keeping and carrying my yoga mat. I'm also not embarrassed to bring it into my boxing gym lol
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bell

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but effective
customer_reviews.text: This product makes carrying a yoga mat much easier. The strap is adjustable on each end, so it can fit either any sized mat. The only thing that may concern some people is that the strap could be long, so your yoga mat would hang down your side or back pretty far. Doesn't bother me though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: I have been carrying a rolled up yoga mat for years. This is my first sling and I like that I can now carry my mat sleep nag over my shoulder. Pretty easy to use. Holding up. Only had for less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Anne fashionista

customer_reviews.title: Great strap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Durable and strong. We use it all the time it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Heitzman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and very sturdy. I can carry my two mats and my blanket all at once. Only wish I had color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Jft

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable carrying sling for the yoga mat I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable carrying sling for the yoga mat I bought which came without any carrying option. The fabric is soft and I like the fact it is cotton and not synthetic fabric. It grabs the yoga mat well. Good price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Not super secure
customer_reviews.text: I like this strap, but I don't feel like it's super secure. There are times when I notice it slipping down my mat. I will likely try another style sling.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like I'd hoped. Seems high quality to me. For the money if definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: It works so I have to give it three stars for that but it pisses me off. It slides up and down and it's not the easiest to carry but it does work. I wouldn't buy it again or recommend it though
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent yoga carrying sling. Purchased one about a year ago, and now purchased a second one as a gift for my daughter. Very easy to use and quietly able to apply. It is also the perfect length and holds the mat securely when it's on or off your shoulder. Thanks for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sellnau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - everything you need, Don't waste your money on an expensive one from Lululemon
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Marychurch

customer_reviews.title: Probably better for lightweight yoga mats
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this is designed for mats that are not very heavy, but I have a rubber-tree mat and the strap dug into my shoulder. I went ahead and purchased a yoga mat bag, instead.
customer_reviews.author: G. M.

customer_reviews.title: Best way to carry a yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, durable thick strap, and comfortable on shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Busymomof3

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fine for what I needed it for. It Didn't blow me away, but it worked how I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed at an affordable price. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed at an affordable price. I use this with my Manduka ProLite. No need for a pricier strap to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple yoga mat carrier and this fit the bill. The price is VERY reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Wall

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to slip on & off of my mat. Stays tight around the mat while in the car so no problems with slipping off. Great product! Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have people ask me all the time where I got it. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you really need
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I love that it's cotton and not something completely unnatural. The ends are adjustable to fit any size and easy to take on/off. Simple and easy and really all you need in a yoga strap. Nothing too complicated or fancy, just easy to use and seems like it would be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Solle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and seems like it is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: tricia myers

customer_reviews.title: This strap is comfortable and adjustable and everything I was looking for in ...
customer_reviews.text: This strap is comfortable and adjustable and everything I was looking for in a yoga mat strap. What’s great is it even doubles as a rope for stretching in the yoga studio :)
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose strap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a waterproof mat I like to bring to picnics. It's very handy!
customer_reviews.author: HotMomma07

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Yoga Mat Strap
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and made very well, especially for the price. I really like how the loops are designed with all fabric and slide very easily to open and put around the ends of my yoga mat. They tighten just as easily.
customer_reviews.author: MJN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and you can quickly strap or unstrap your yoga mat. Also, the straps stay in place when walking with the mat, so your mat stays securely attached. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: awesome carrier. easy to roll up and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome carrier. easy to roll up and I love that it's adjustable depending on how tightly you wrap the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The straps work well and are needed for the mats we purchased the company needs to lower the cost for what they are providing. They should come with the mats. All in all the do the job.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grip.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that my 24-year old mat gripped better. And the carrying sling falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga practioner

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lulu Lemon mat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, adjustable straps that can slide around any size mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Strap is too long
customer_reviews.text: Strap is way too long and the way the ends connect doesn't look nice when attached to the mat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Akins

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and works great! Such a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Heavy fabric, well made, holds my yoga mat perfectly, and it’s comfortable on my shoulder. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of the strap and the easiness of getting over my meds size they are rolled up. I only wish it was a little smaller in length. Would Definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: EEC

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and it can double as a strap ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and it can double as a strap for Yoga class. I use it with a Gaiam mat, but the adjustable size means it should work for any mat. I much prefer this to one that stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Gerat strap to hold yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Great straps to hold my yoga mat. Simple yet very effective for yoga mats of all size and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: maddash

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great strap for any size mat. Comfortable and east to clean
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to carry the mat walking but not for car storage
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a strap to carry your mat on your back this one is good. It's easy to use . But if you do not have any tension in the strap it loosens. My goal was to use the strap to keep the mat fit tight in my car. No luck there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga mat carrier is really great! The strap is good quality and nice material. It's soft so the strap doesn't rub harshly on your skin. It was also a great price and arrived very quickly. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes
